dialog: What would you like for your main course, wizard?
I'll have a steak, medium rare, please.
Do you have any reading material, wizard?
Yes, I do have some.
Could I borrow one, wizard?
Of course, here you go.
Thank you. It's quite chilly this morning, isn't it?
You're not wrong there.
Have you heard any news, wizard?
Which news are you referring to?
Brazil won the World Cup.
I see, indeed.
We have an orientation this afternoon.
What will be covered during the orientation?
The company introduction, our mission and vision, various policies, insurance, pension plan, company ID, batch, telephone, email set-up, and training.
That's quite a lot. All of that in one afternoon?
Yes, it won't be easy.
I'm OK with it. I like being busy and learning new things.
Excuse me, wizard, could you please guide me to the human resources department?
Of course, but have you made an appointment beforehand?
